job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you excel in tackling intricate challenges and crafting features that leave a mark? As a Full-Stack Engineer with us, you'll shape cutting-edge AI-driven solutions that redefine learning and personal growth. Your focus will be on executing with precision, ensuring our offerings are robust, scalable, and truly game-changing.

   Dive into products revolutionizing education:
     * TeachTap: Utilizes AI to animate historical personas in an engaging TikTok-style learning journey.
     * TeachTales: Captivates learners through customized, enchanting narratives that enhance understanding.
     * TimeBack: Acts as a learning ally, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to offer proactive student guidance.
     * Athena: Delivers tangible academic results through AI-crafted videos and assessments.

   With generative AI at our core, we automate routine tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful development and problem-solving. You'll create features that touch thousands of users while collaborating with a diverse, talented global team.

   Our mantra is excellence in execution and operational superiority. If you're eager to tackle sophisticated technical puzzles and make a significant impact, we want to connect with you.

   What you will be doing

     * Crafting cutting-edge web applications with premier libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies.
     * Conducting thorough code reviews to uphold best practices, team standards, and client needs.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on trivial bug fixes or enhancements in obsolete codebases.
     * Managing cumbersome infrastructure to maintain poorly designed products.
     * Getting entangled in endless meetings about roadmaps and priorities or chasing after colleagues.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Do you excel in tackling intricate challenges and crafting features that leave a mark? As a Full-Stack Engineer with us, you'll shape cutting-edge AI-driven solutions that redefine learning and personal growth. Your focus will be on executing with precision, ensuring our offerings are robust, scalable, and truly game-changing.

   Dive into products revolutionizing education:
     * TeachTap: Utilizes AI to animate historical personas in an engaging TikTok-style learning journey.
     * TeachTales: Captivates learners through customized, enchanting narratives that enhance understanding.
     * TimeBack: Acts as a learning ally, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to offer proactive student guidance.
     * Athena: Delivers tangible academic results through AI-crafted videos and assessments.

   With generative AI at our core, we automate routine tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful development and problem-solving. You'll create features that touch thousands of users while collaborating with a diverse, talented global team.

   Our mantra is excellence in execution and operational superiority. If you're eager to tackle sophisticated technical puzzles and make a significant impact, we want to connect with you.

   What you will be doing

     * Crafting cutting-edge web applications with premier libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies.
     * Conducting thorough code reviews to uphold best practices, team standards, and client needs.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on trivial bug fixes or enhancements in obsolete codebases.
     * Managing cumbersome infrastructure to maintain poorly designed products.
     * Getting entangled in endless meetings about roadmaps and priorities or chasing after colleagues.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications powered by generative AI, specifically mentioning products that use AI for content creation (animated personas, narratives, videos) and as a learning ally. The core responsibilities involve crafting web applications, enhancing cloud-native backends, and working with generative AI at its core, aligning with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While it mentions 'Full Stack Engineer', the context and specific examples point towards building user-facing systems leveraging generative AI models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Crafting cutting-edge web applications with premier libraries and tools' directly relates to building user-facing software. 'Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies' also falls under developing and integrating software components.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting cutting-edge web applications with premier libraries and tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies' describes the development and integration of backend services, a key aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends with the latest AWS serverless technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conducting thorough code reviews to uphold best practices, team standards, and client needs' is a standard software development practice focused on code quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Conducting thorough code reviews to uphold best practices, team standards, and client needs

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'With generative AI at our core, we automate routine tasks' and the descriptions of products like TeachTap ('Utilizes AI to animate historical personas'), TeachTales ('customized, enchanting narratives'), and Athena ('AI-crafted videos and assessments') indicate direct work with or application of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: With generative AI at our core

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'redefine learning and personal growth' and the description of products focused on education and learning indicate an understanding of the business domain and its goals.
The description of TeachTap using AI to animate historical personas directly relates to generative AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilizes AI to animate historical personas in an engaging TikTok-style learning journey

job_tasks.justification: The description of TeachTales creating customized narratives through AI falls under generative AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Captivates learners through customized, enchanting narratives that enhance understanding

job_tasks.justification: The description of TimeBack acting as a learning ally and offering proactive student guidance implies AI-driven assistance, likely involving generative or predictive models.
job_tasks.phrase: Acts as a learning ally, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to offer proactive student guidance

job_tasks.justification: The description of Athena delivering academic results through AI-crafted videos and assessments directly points to generative AI content creation.
job_tasks.phrase: Delivers tangible academic results through AI-crafted videos and assessments

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'allowing you to concentrate on impactful development and problem-solving' in the context of generative AI automating tasks highlights the focus on higher-level AI application development.
job_tasks.phrase: concentrate on impactful development and problem-solving

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'collaborating with a diverse, talented global team' indicates the need for effective teamwork and communication across different groups.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborating with a diverse, talented global team

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'tackle sophisticated technical puzzles' in the context of AI-driven solutions implies complex modeling and application challenges.
